section.p: Contains the response to a Date assessment question, for example, "when was the last time you had a alcoholic beverage?"

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Point In Time
The response to a True/False assessment question.

Contains exactly one [1..1] assessmentQuestion with data type Code
Code indicating the question asked as part of the assessment tool performed.
Contains zero or one [0..1] responseScore with data type Real

Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Point In Time
The response to a True/False assessment question.
